attributes.review:
I wanted to get this app to show my support against the weird curry munchers that are slowly taking over the tech sector of this great and all powerful country before this app had the audacity to tell me I live in a house full of brown people. I have never been more insulted or gaslighted. My family is a beautiful group of aryans who just happen to have a spray-tanning addiction. As well as what they call “Sweet Home Alabama Syndrome.”
This app kept telling me to take pictures of myself for my “profile” but it had weird requests like “show only your bare feet” and “make sure your gluteals are in full view”. It also asked me if I was legal. I hope you know, pre-marital hand-holding is against the law and in the eyes of God, you are a sinner. Unfortunately, according to my niece, “if you don’t sin, Jesus died for nothing.” 
When I tried sending our glorious president a message of support, the app told me it couldn’t submit, because I didn’t, “use the required amount of ethnic and homophobic slurs.” Which is strange, considering my message had almost 40 of them. And whenever I tried to upload my Blood Drop Cross for a profile picture, it kept editing it into a police badge. I understand the reasoning obviously, but I thought this app was supposed to be a safe space.
I hope the developers consider fixing the bugs and rereleasing the app. Or it’s a pathetic insult to Amerikkka, the great nation we live in.
attributes.title: Probably the biggest waste of storage on my phone

attributes.review: This app wasn’t it… I would explain to you why this up wasn’t it but it would be faster to tell you what did like to get this over with. As a fellow American follower of the trumpet a.k.a. Burns father I sit here and ask myself who made this up I’m sitting here eating my pizza super annoyed, frustrated miss read ,and absolutely insulted😞😤😤😤😤😤😤😤😤😤😤😤😤😤. Whoever created this app should be fired… I can’t even eat 😒😒. OMFG 🥵🥵let me tell you the tea sis, so I open the app & it immediately asked for a phone number😐😐😐... Yes sis a PHONE NUMBER.. 😓😓😓 you heard it right a PhOnE nUmBer 😵😵😵😵😵😵. I’m sitting there like phone number ????!!!??? Who even has phone SERVICE???? Not me I’ll tell you that. I mean for god sake I own a blackberry.. I don’t even think this type of phone takes phone service & if it does & the trumpet 🎺 himself offers to pay for the bill then I could reconsider my review but I mean honestly phone number????? This phone doesn’t even get Internet access half the time, as I sit here writing this review I think what I could be doing with the internet access I am getting.. wast of time,  don’t download this app I am disgusted. Fix it boomer 🤯🤯🤯🤯.
attributes.title: Wasn’t it

attributes.review:
So,
I downloaded this app to admire my fav Cheeto🥰 then when they said it was age restricted that confused me, why would it be age restricted🤔 then I realized there’s probably some not nice pictures of Cheeto🧡but I download it anyway so I could book tickets at rallies and then not go hehe😈 unfortunately I was met with the NaSty stuff😔 PICTURES OF CHEETO🤢
They really offended me as a lady because I’ve never seen a more RACIST, UGLY, CRUSTY DUSTY, PRIVILEGED, FATTIE, THINKS HE’S HOT, IGNORANT, IMMATURE, SEXIST, DOUCHE BAG, in my ENTIRE lifeeeee. Anyway then there was some picks of Mike Pence being an ugly fugly b!tch🥴 And then I got a phone call from a random number that said Washington D.C. for the location and I answered and it was trump asking if I wanted to come over and obviously I said “NO!🤬” and then he got mad and threatened me with the U.S. government 🔫! Then I woke up in a sweat because he’s so ugly 🙄And thennnn Barron was sitting on my bed in nothing but a robe🤑And then I woke up for real! Thanks for listening😊!
#freebarron2020

attributes.title: Trumps app

attributes.review: this app does not do anything for the betterment of this country or any society, i suggest it gets taken down because it’s really just an app that removes space on phones for more important things.
attributes.title: Useless app

attributes.review: I opened the app and was so excited to help our incredible president make America great again, so you can imagine my disappointment when it turned out to be a complete disaster. As soon as it finished loading, a warning popped up telling me all the money had been drained from my bank account and it thanked me for donating to the Trump campaign. Now I would gladly donate to the campaign of the greatest president this country has ever seen, but they took everything. I can’t even afford to feed my kids. Needless to say I was a little panicky, so I called my bank and they said I had nothing left and that they couldn’t help me because I had “willingly” turned over all my money. I can’t believe the people on Trump’s campaign team would do this to the very fine people that support him.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD ⭕️❌

attributes.review: :( this app was so difficult to use and gave my phone a virus
